class.name: com.navis.argo.business.extract.ArchiveChargeableMarineEvent
class.meta: Domain entity representing Archive billable marine events

property.name: arBexmArchiveDate
property.meta: The time this ChargeableMarineEvent was archived.

property.name: arBexmOriginalGkey
property.meta: The GKey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arBexmBatchId
property.meta: Batch ID to group all the transactions as a set

property.name: arBexmEventTypeId
property.meta: Event Id eg: TUG, PILOT etc.,

property.name: arBexmVslTypeId
property.meta: The avessel type RORO, PSNGR etc.,

property.name: arBexmVslLoaCm
property.meta: Vessel Length over All in CM

property.name: arBexmPerformed
property.meta: The date and time service was performed

property.name: arBexmInboundFirstFreeDay
property.meta: Storage First Free Day for inbound cargo

property.name: arBexmTimeDischargeComplete
property.meta: Time discharge of entire carrier visit completed.

property.name: arBexmIsLocked
property.meta: Locked record is not allowed for modification. Default value is false.

property.name: arBexmStatus
property.meta: Third party system mark the status to avoid re-extract

property.name: arBexmPayeeCustomerId
property.meta: The customer who is going to pay the charges.(Bill to party)

property.name: arBexmPayeeRole
property.meta: Role of this business unit: shipping line, agent, etc.

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.extract.ArchiveChargeableUnitEvent
class.meta: Domain entity representing archive billable events of unit

property.name: arBexuArchiveDate
property.meta: The time this ChargeableUnitEvent was archived.

property.name: arBexuOriginalGkey
property.meta: The GKey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arBexuBatchId
property.meta: Batch ID to group all the transactions as a set

property.name: arBexuEventType
property.meta: Event Id eg: DISCHARGE, LOAD , STORAGE etc.,

property.name: arBexuEqSubClass
property.meta: Equipment sub class CTR, CHS etc.

property.name: arBexuCategory
property.meta: The Category of the equipment (Import, Export, ...).

property.name: arBexuPaidThruDay
property.meta: Day thru which demurrage charges have been paid

property.name: arBexuImdgClass
property.meta: IMDG Class. If multiple hazardous, then store the max value

property.name: arBexuFireCode
property.meta: Worst fire code for hazardous cargo

property.name: arBexuFireCodeClass
property.meta: Worst fire code class for hazardous cargo

property.name: arBexuTimeOfLoading
property.meta: The time at which the ufv was loaded to the outbound carrier.

property.name: arBexuTimeFirstFreeDay
property.meta: Date/time discharged cargo is available for pickup.

property.name: arBexuTimeDischargeComplete
property.meta: Time discharge of entire carrier visit completed.

property.name: arBexuCargoQuantityUnit
property.meta: Volume or weight units (kilograms, gallons, etc.) of cargo quantity

property.name: arBexuIbintendedLocType
property.meta: The intended arrival location type. VESSEL, TRUCK, TRAIN

property.name: arBexuIbintendedVisitId
property.meta: The intended inbound carrier visit id

property.name: arBexuIbintendedCallNbr
property.meta: The intended inbound carrier call nbr

property.name: arBexuIbintendedVesselType
property.meta: The intended inbound vessel type RORO, PSNGR etc.,

property.name: arBexuIbintendedCarrierLineId
property.meta: The intended inbound carrier line id

property.name: arBexuIbintendedServiceId
property.meta: Intended inbound service Id. Applicable for vessel

property.name: arBexuIbintendedVesselClassId
property.meta: Intended inbound vessel class Id. Applicable for vessel

property.name: arBexuIbLocType
property.meta: The actual arrival location type. VESSEL, TRUCK, TRAIN

property.name: arBexuIbVisitId
property.meta: The actual inbound carrier visit id

property.name: arBexuIbCallNbr
property.meta: The actual inbound carrier call nbr

property.name: arBexuIbVesselType
property.meta: The actual inbound vessel type RORO, PSNGR etc.,

property.name: arBexuIbCarrierLineId
property.meta: The actual inbound carrier line id

property.name: arBexuIbServiceId
property.meta: Inbound service Id. Applicable for vessel

property.name: arBexuIbVesselClassId
property.meta: Inbound vessel class Id. Applicable for vessel

property.name: arBexuIbVesselLloydsId
property.meta: The actual inbound vessel Lloyds identity

property.name: arBexuObintendedLocType
property.meta: The intended departure location type. VESSEL, TRUCK, TRAIN

property.name: arBexuObintendedVisitId
property.meta: The intended outbound carrier visit id

property.name: arBexuObintendedCallNbr
property.meta: The intended outbound carrier call nbr

property.name: arBexuObintendedVesselType
property.meta: The intended outbound vessel type RORO, PSNGR etc.,

property.name: arBexuObintendedCarrierLineId
property.meta: The intended outbound carrier line id

property.name: arBexuObintendedServiceId
property.meta: Intended outbound service Id. Applicable for vessel

property.name: arBexuObintendedVesselClassId
property.meta: Intended outbound vessel class Id. Applicable for vessel

property.name: arBexuObLocType
property.meta: The actual departure location type. VESSEL, TRUCK, TRAIN

property.name: arBexuObVisitId
property.meta: The actual outbound carrier visit id

property.name: arBexuObCallNbr
property.meta: The actual outbound carrier call nbr

property.name: arBexuObVesselType
property.meta: The actual outbound vessel type RORO, PSNGR etc.,

property.name: arBexuObCarrierLineId
property.meta: The actual outbound carrier line id

property.name: arBexuObServiceId
property.meta: Outbound service Id. Applicable for vessel

property.name: arBexuObVesselClassId
property.meta: Outbound vessel class Id. Applicable for vessel

property.name: arBexuObVesselLloydsId
property.meta: The actual outbound vessel Lloyds identity

property.name: arBexuEventStartTime
property.meta: Start time of the event. It is applicale like STORAGE,REEFER kind

property.name: arBexuEventEndTime
property.meta: End time of the event. It is applicale like STORAGE,REEFER kind

property.name: arBexuRuleStartDay
property.meta: STORAGE/REEFER rule start day as per rule definition

property.name: arBexuRuleEndDay
property.meta: STORAGE/REEFER rule end day as per rule definition

property.name: arBexuPayeeCustomerId
property.meta: The customer who is going to pay the charges.(Bill to party)

property.name: arBexuPayeeRole
property.meta: Role of this business unit: shipping line, agent, etc.

property.name: arBexuFirstAvailability
property.meta: First availability date. It is applicable for STORAGE

property.name: arBexuIsLocked
property.meta: Locked record is not allowed for modification. Default value is false.

property.name: arBexuStatus
property.meta: Third party system mark the status to avoid re-extract

property.name: arBexuIsOverrideValue
property.meta: Is Tariff rate value to be override?

property.name: arBexuOverrideValue
property.meta: Override value (rate or fixed amount or percentage)

property.name: arBexuGnteInvProcessingStatus
property.meta: Invoice processing status is used for internal purpose to be used by Groovy script

property.name: arBexuVerifiedGrossMass
property.meta: Goods and Container weight in Kgs (VGM-Verified Gross Mass) as verified by Terminal.

property.name: arBexuVgmVerifierEntity
property.meta: Verifier of the Gross Mass Ex: Load port, Shipper

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.extract.ArchiveChargeableAppointmentEvent
class.meta: Domain entity representing billable appointment events

property.name: arBexaArchiveDate
property.meta: The time this ChargeableAppointmentEvent was archived.

property.name: arBexaOriginalGkey
property.meta: The GKey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arBexaBatchId
property.meta: Batch ID to group all the transactions as a set

property.name: arBexaEventTypeId
property.meta: Event Id eg: TUG, PILOT etc.,

property.name: arBexaStatus
property.meta: Third party system mark the status to avoid re-extract

property.name: arBexaPerformed
property.meta: The date and time service was performed

property.name: arBexaApptState
property.meta: The state of this appointment (Created, Used)

property.name: arBexaApptDate
property.meta: The date and time appointment was created

property.name: arBexaTransactionType
property.meta: The transaction type of this time slot

property.name: arBexaUnitId
property.meta: Unit Identifier:Container number, Chassis number, Marks and Numbers, etc. An name by which people identify this Unit.

class.name: com.navis.argo.business.extract.ArchiveGuarantee
class.meta: Domain entity representing guarantees for billable events

property.name: arGnteArchiveDate
property.meta: The time this Guarantee was archived.

property.name: arGnteOriginalGkey
property.meta: The GKey of the original entity before it's been purged/archived.

property.name: arGnteAppliedToClass
property.meta: Name of the business class of the EXTRACT entity

property.name: arGnteAppliedToPrimaryKey
property.meta: Primary key of the EXTRACT entity ChargeableUnitEvent, ChargeableMarineEvent etc.,

property.name: arGnteAppliedToNaturalKey
property.meta: Natural key of the EXTRACT entity Equipment ID, Vessel Visit ID etc.,

property.name: arGnteGuaranteeId
property.meta: Generated sequence with configurable prefix defined at facility level

property.name: arGnteGuaranteeCustomerGkey
property.meta: Gkey of the organization (Line operator, trucking co., agent etc.) that is making the guarantee

property.name: arGnteGuaranteeCustomerId
property.meta: Id of the organization (Line operator, trucking co., agent etc.) that is making the guarantee

property.name: arGnteExternalUserId
property.meta: External user using the Terminal's Portal system (Eg: CSP User Id)

property.name: arGnteExternalCity
property.meta: The city where it is located

property.name: arGnteExternalMailCode
property.meta: The mail code where this address is located

many-to-one.name: arGnteExternalState
many-to-one.meta: The state where it is located

many-to-one.name: arGnteExternalCountry
many-to-one.meta: The Country where it is located

property.name: arGnteExternalFax
property.meta: The fax number of this customer

property.name: arGnteExternalEmailAddress
property.meta: The contact email address of this customer

property.name: arGnteGuaranteeStartDay
property.meta: For Storage/Power events, the first day this is being guaranteed

property.name: arGnteGuaranteeEndDay
property.meta: For Storage/Power events, the end day this is being guaranteed

property.name: arGnteQuantity
property.meta: Quantity ( No of days / No of Unit etc.,)

property.name: arGntePaymentType
property.meta: Payment type Credit Card / Pay Pal / Check

property.name: arGntePaymentNbr
property.meta: Payment number such as check number, money order number, wire transfer confirmation number

property.name: arGntePaymentDate
property.meta: Check date, Money order date, Wire Transfer date

property.name: arGnteTransactionReference
property.meta: Payment transaction reference - credit card transaction reference number

property.name: arGnteInvoiceStatus
property.meta: Invoiced gurantee record will have a value of INVOICED otherwise it is null

property.name: arGnteInvDraftNbr
property.meta: Invoice draft number to be updated by Groovy script.

many-to-one.name: arGnteRelatedGuarantee
many-to-one.meta: Refers to another Guarantee record such as GuaranteeType = WAIVER record
